content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1646156638526{margin-top: -40px !important;}” el_class=”pb4″][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

Excel Title Group, LLC is a real estate service provider specializing in protecting and insuring real estate properties from title defects. With offices across Texas, we’re large enough to manage all of your title needs, while serving as a dedicated, qualified resource for every transaction.

From residential and commercial title services to REO/foreclosures and title search products, our family of licensed title professionals serves clients with exceptional, personal treatment. Though we use streamlined methods and innovative technology, our efficiency doesn’t replace our “first-class” service.

At Excel Title Group, we make you feel at home and do all we can to make every transaction as smooth as possible.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1646155781318{background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}” el_class=”pt5 pb5″][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Excel Title Locations

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Lubbock

11006 Indiana Ave, Suite 100
Lubbock, TX 79423
806-500-2275

View Location[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Red Oak

421 Century Way, Suite 300
Red Oak, TX 75154
469-807-8868

View Location[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Excel Title Group | Lubbock
5.0
Based on 1 reviews
review us on
Jennifer Moore
00:15 26 Feb 22
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
